name: Guisseppe's Forest Hall Vol. 1 (Mr. Hwang Version)
name_original: Guisseppe's Forest Hall Vol. 1 (Mr. Hwang Version)
description:
A short, semi-linear, fast-paced, movement based first-person platformer, where you are mostly maneuvering in mid-air. Its also got light visual story telling. I'm planning on this being a series of short games where each installment expands on the previous one.

Music (in the order that you'll hear them):

XMAS_EVE10 [120]thanaton3mix], by Aphex Twin

C3L3STIAL_CITY, by bliss3three

The Crazy Cap store song from super mario odessey

Workinonit, by J Dilla

Guisseppe's Forest Hall, an original song by a nameless artist  for this game (or Eli, if you know u know)

Interview B, by Death Grips 

10, by Puzzle
